strapiPost.title: Click Driven
strapiPost.content:
What if you could order a car online, then have it delivered to you as soon as the next day? Well, it’s possible now in Northwest Arkansas, because Carvana has come to town. 

  • Driven to you: The leading e-commerce platform has expanded into the fourth Arkansas market, delivering to “Fayetteville area residents.” Now you can shop an inventory of more than 45,000 used cars and have a touchless home delivery. 
  • Faster, cheaper: The business offers auto financing, access to a car loan calculator, and just plain savings on time and money when it comes to car shopping. 

Read more HERE.
